summary:
In the mountains overlooking the small town of Riverwood, sits a home to the faction of your choice. Secrets await in the unsuspecting cabin, it is after all far more than it appears to be on the outside. 
There are now two versions of Stormcloak Hideout.
Stormcloak Hideout or Stormcloak Hideout - Imperial.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][size=5][color=#3BB9FF]Stormcloak Hideout + Imperial Hideout[/b][/u][/size][/color]
In the mountains overlooking the small town of Riverwood, sits a home to the faction of your choice. Secrets await in the unsuspecting cabin, it is after all far more than it appears to be on the outside. 

[b][color=#3BB9FF]WARNING: If updating from anything below .5, remove all items from the Hideout before updating. The hideout has been completely redesigned with .5 and I don\'t want to see people losing precious items.[/b][/color]

There are two versions of Stormcloak Hideout.
[list] [*]Stormcloak Hideout
[*]Stormcloak Hideout - Imperial Version[/list]
-Choose the one which suits your character\'s style the best.
[color=#3BB9FF]--------------------[/color]
[b][u][size=3][color=#3BB9FF]Features[/b][/u][/size][/color]
[list][*]9 Mannequins
[*]Lots of Weapon Racks
[*]6 Bookshelves (198 Slots total)
[*]Plenty of storage.
[*]NPCs  along with a Quartermaster in the Hideout.
[*]Stable with horse outside.
[*]Crafting areas (All crafts)
[*]Prison cell with the opposite factions captives inside of it.
[*]Plenty of more things included, check it out for yourself to see it all. ^^[/list]
[color=#3BB9FF]--------------------[/color]
If you like the Hideout, Endorse it, it will make it easier for others to find when looking for a nice player home. Also it will keep me up-to-date on how many people use it and are waiting on updates.

Have an idea of something you think would go nicely with Stormcloak Hideout, such as an addition. Just leave me a comment and I will see what you think should be included.

[b][u][size=3][color=#3BB9FF]Video Review[/b][/u][/size][/color]
New video coming soon of .5.

[b][u][size=3][color=#3BB9FF]Important[/b][/u][/size][/color]
If swapping from Stormcloak Hideout to Imperial Hideout or vise versa, remove all items from the other one, I don\'t want to be responsible for precious items being lost.
ONLY USE ONE .ESP FILE EITHER \"Stormcloak Hideout.esp or Stormcloak Hideout - Imperial.esp\"

[b][u][size=3][color=#3BB9FF]Changelog[/b][/u][/size][/color]
[color=#3BB9FF][b].5[/color][/b]
[list] [*]Moved the entrance to clear up some random Riverwood NPC bugs.
[*]New interior section added to go along with the new entrance.
[*]Hideout completely redesigned.
[*]Hopefully fixed some of the NPC Follower pathing bugs.
[*]Further optimization of the hideout for Low-End PC users.
[*]Updated video walkthrough and new screenshots will also be added shortly after the release of .5.[/list]
[color=#3BB9FF][b].4[/color][/b]
[list] [*]Blacksmith area added with a new vendor.
[*]Dungeon area with captives added, go ahead, kill them for fun.
[*]Master bedroom added by request/suggestion.
[*]Guards now populate the hideout with you, not too many though.
[*]Navmesh corrected, followers will now join you inside your home.
[*]Map Marker for fast travel added.
[*]This update took quite a while to do, I\'m sure I forgot to list something. However I hope you all enjoy it.[/list]
[color=#3BB9FF][b].3.5[/color][/b]
[list] [*]Vendor added. 
[*]Stormcloak Hideout - Imperial version added.[/list]
[color=#3BB9FF][b].3[/color][/b]
[list] [*]Mannequins now working properly. 
[*]Weapon Racks added. 
[*]Shrine Display added. 
[*]Banners changed to Stormcloak banners. 
[*]Vendor preview. (Non-working) 
[*]Other tiny things added. [/list]
[color=#3BB9FF][b].2[/color][/b]
[list] [*]More organization done to the hideout. 
[*]Lighting added. 
[*]Rubble clutter removed. 
[*]Mannequins added. (Non-working) [/list]
[color=#3BB9FF][b].1[/color][/b]
[list] [*]Planning stage. [/list]

[b][u][size=3][color=#3BB9FF]Bugs[/b][/u][/size][/color]
[b][color=#3BB9FF]Please report any bugs you encounter. Thank you.[/b][/color]
[list] [*]Not really a bug, however the house is very lit up, if you do not like the lighting let me know, my fiance can\'t stand having a dim player house so she asked me to light it up more. I will include a \"more dim\" version in the future.[/list]
[color=#3BB9FF]--------------------[/color]
author: Extreme118
